blocks.title: Stay in control
blocks.description: We dont hold control over your assets, view how your assets are performing and invest without any lock-in periods.

blocks.title: Created by professionals
blocks.description: Bubl's are managed by leading crypto experts and built upon researched backed themes.

blocks.title: Designed for you
blocks.description: Bubl invests into multiple crypto assets which protects you against the volatility of a specific asset, thus making bubl's less riskier.
